```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = TRUE, message=FALSE, comment="")

options(knitr.kable.NA = ".")

select <- c(1:4, 9,10, 15,16)
```

# 0.5b, c11 = c22

```{r}
load("18rows/set-0.5b-all.RData")
kable(set[[1]][select, -1], digits = 3)
```


# 0.5b, c11 = 1, c22 = 0

```{r}
load("18rows/set-0.5b-all-c10.RData")
kable(set[[1]][select, -1], digits = 3)
```

# 0.5b, c11 = 0, c22 = 1

```{r}
load("18rows/set-0.5b-all-c01.RData")
kable(set[[1]][select, -1], digits = 3)
```
